p: Nerol was administered orally at doses of 10 to 300 mg/kg. The experimental model used in this study was oxazolone induction in mice. This induction represents a model of sepsis and can resemble a severe type of UC, associated with early and severe mucosal lesions and a high mortality rate [ 90]. The variables measured in animals with oxazolone-induced colitis include weight loss, stool consistency, macroscopic damage and levels of inflammatory cytokines [ 91].
